content: What's everyone doing for Bitcoin Pizza Day (BPD) 2024?The best tagline I've heard so far is: "14 years ago, you could buy pizza for 10,000 bitcoins... now you can buy 10,000 pizzas for 1 bitcoin!"I will be at Scratch Restaurant from 11am until 1pm. This is my flagship location that has been accepting bitcoin since 2018!https://facebook.com/events/s/bitcoin-pizza-day/751797533827918/Then, in the afternoon, we will head to Higher Heights Fitness for a crypto 101 discussion from 2pm until 3pm.https://www.facebook.com/events/362670259601793/Hope you can join if you're near me. Otherwise, share your plans here!

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Those times are gone when someone needed to spend 10k Bitcoin to buy two Pizzas now you can buy more than 15k pizzas with 1 BTC. Not 10k but 15k pizzas. Those who mined it early or bought it when it was cheaper are enjoying their lives now but those who haven't bought it yet could still buy it and have some good returns in a decade or two.

comments.body: Quote from: SamReomo on May 14, 2024, 01:38:39 PMThose times are gone when someone needed to spend 10k Bitcoin to buy two Pizzas now you can buy more than 15k pizzas with 1 BTC. Not 10k but 15k pizzas. Those who mined it early or bought it when it was cheaper are enjoying their lives now but those who haven't bought it yet could still buy it and have some good returns in a decade or two. Makes you look at things in perspective too because bitcoin at some point was a worthless internet money but then things changed for the better and the change was really something that people never expected, maybe some at the early stages believed it but the people that were skeptical were much more compared to those that believe it. You can definitely still make money though, bitcoin still has a potential to grow even higher and this probably not the last time that it's going to happen so we definitely still have time and don't waste it, just keep on investing.

comments.author: Z-tight
comments.body: Quote from: SamReomo on May 14, 2024, 01:38:39 PMThose who mined it early or bought it when it was cheaper are enjoying their lives now but those who haven't bought it yet could still buy it and have some good returns in a decade or two. Those who mined it early could have also sold it early when the price rose a little bit, or they could have lost their coins, because BTC was not worth much back then, and there was not so much incentive to store BTC's safely. However, it is not even about people making money, this is just a time to appreciate how far BTC has come and how much growth it has experienced from the early times until today, it is a great feeling to be part of this network and community.
